review.review_reply: Thank you for trusting us with your home!  We appreciate your business!

review.comment: Pride came out because my sewage had frozen and backed up. I paid 87$ for a guy to come and tell me that he couldn’t do anything about it and didn’t have the tools to even if he wanted to… wound up calling Roto Rooter and they only charge 25$ to come out and had the problem fixed in no time. Don’t waste time with a company that doesn’t even have the tools to do a job!
review.review_reply: Unfortunately we did not know your sewer was froze until we ran our machine which kinked our cable enough that we had to replace it. We let everyone of our customers know up front when they call in there is a $87.00 fee to get the technician out there if any work is done we will apply it to the invoice. If you can call our office we will refund your money.

review.comment: Good service.

Scott was prompt, careful  and answered all of my questions about my furnace.
I  feel comfortable to have found this company! This is my second time doing business with them.
Staff was personable, able to articulate what was wrong and several options to fix the problem. Nobody is excited to replace a hot water heater, but this was a decent experience.
review.review_reply: Thank you for trusting us with your home!

review.comment: Employee was rude and pushy about what needed done and I had him on speaker phone and my sister was shocked by the way he was speaking to me will never use again.
review.review_reply: Hi Tina, Last time we were at your house was in November. You are also a service member with us which means we are at your home twice a year to take care of any issues. Our technician might have been concerned with your issue and his tone was with urgency. We can not help you if you don’t want to fix any of your issues. Please call our office we would like to know how our tech was rude to you so we can better serve other clients in the future.

review.comment: Great Service, Our service Rep called and was Early. Then he was very professional and very friendly. It was a joy to have this young man service our hot water heater.. Thank You
They came and replaced my water heater. Very courteous and professional. Got me taken care of within an hr very fast and took away the trash thank you very much great job fellas!
Great team -very professional and personable
Wow! They arrived within 30 minutes of calling (to Fruita)! The fella was very knowledgeable and efficient. Fixed our issues quickly. We have heat again! Reasonably priced also. I'm happy.
Mark arrived early and fixed the problem quickly and professionally.
professional, fair price, great communicators
review.review_reply: Thank you for allowing us to serve you!

review.comment: Scott is amazing, knows what he’s doing, is personable, and shared a lot of helpful information on how we should plan on our water heater and boiler for the future.

Very professional team.  Scheduling was easy.  Got a message when they left to travel to my location, which gave me time to get there.  Assessed my problems and gave me a quote to fix.  Worked within that quote cost and time to fix my problem.  Kept my house clean.  Made sure my cats didn't get out.  Will definitely call again as needed!
Mark and his helper were wonderful, on time, professional, knowledgeable and pleasure to work with.
review.review_reply: Thank you, We appreciate your business.

review.comment: The guys were very professional and courteous. They diagnosed and fixed our problem quickly and we’re very communicative about what needed done and how much it would cost. They were very respectful of our home and did an excellent job.
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words, we appreciate your business!

review.comment:
Mark came to camera drain line from mop sink. We discussed the issue and he looked in the drain at the sink and told me he can’t camera through water, he said he could go through the trap that had water in it to see if the pipe was clear of water and it would be $150.00. He said if water was present then he wouldn’t be able to proceed. Knowing that it is very slow and the ice maker dumps water in the drain I am sure the pipe would have water in it.
His honesty saved us the $150.00 and we discussed who in the area does the process we need to find the problem under the concrete floor.
When I paid the service call fee he stated that any issues in the future we may need a plumber or HVAC repairs they would be happy to do the work and they would apply the service call fee to the next issue.
I appreciate the honesty of Mark.
review.review_reply: We love these kind of reviews, thank you for your business!

review.comment: Scott serviced are 6 heaters in our rental units and came back on a service call, repaired are problem. On time, professional, quality work you can’t ask for any more than that thanks Pride plumbing.
review.review_reply: Thank you glad we can help!

review.comment:
Mark was excellent!
So professional, informative and kind.
He didn’t make me feel dumb for questions I asked, and taught me about my system.
I would 100% recommend Mark!!
The business was excellent at keeping in contact with me about when the tech (Mark) would arrive.
Very impressed :)
Very professional, kind and knowledgeable. Scott is a very nice, responseable person. Great at explaining things. Will definitely be using this company in the future .
Stephen was on time and professional. Found the problem and gave us an honest quote
Stephen was amazing. Very informative. Made this terrible leak a great experience!
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pride Plumbing we appreciate your business.
Just a free estimate Robert. We find solutions to issues.

review.comment: Stephen was very courteous and professional. Thank you for a fantastic job...
review.review_reply: Thank you for your business glad to hear your experience was good.

review.comment: Scott was excellent in explaining everything and repairing my heater promptly. Scott is my freaking hero.
review.review_reply: This is the best complement we can get thank you.

review.comment: Mark was very professional and reliable.

Mark came out & cut a hole where the leak detector had guesstimated where the leak was. There wasnt a leak so Mark & the guy from the leak detector met at my house to work together. Mark wound up cutting a few more holes & found it. It wound up being a fitting that was completely broken off. He replaced the broken fitting along with a t. My house is on a slab so it took a while to cut through the concrete each time. He & his helper were very professional & let us know everything they were having to do throughout the process. I will definetely use them in the future! I do not envy their jobs when it comes to cutting into concrete to find leaks
review.review_reply: We appreciate your business and thank you for the kind words.

review.comment: Mark was very prompt and professional came in addressed problem and took care of it in under an hour

My hot water heater has been leaking for quite some time and I couldn't figure out how to fix it myself. Thankfully, an Technician came out the same day that could tell me what was wrong with my equipment! They diagnosed that there was just a leak in one of the pipes next door which flooded over our overflow pans causing this problem - they'd be happy if you used them again too :)
review.review_reply:
Thank you for the great review Moba! We're so happy that we were able to diagnose and fix your hot water heater leak.

We're also glad to hear that you'll be calling us again if there's anything else going on with it in the future. We hope this experience was a pleasant one and appreciate your business.

review.comment: I've used Pride for 3 different jobs over the past 3 years. One was a project of my choice, and the other two were the typical old house "what is leaking NOW?" moments.  I'm impressed by their expertise, professionalism and guarantee on the work done. Plumbing work can be expensive and Pride's rates are very fair for the current market. All the newer technicians are getting great training by working with experienced people like Roger.  Don't DIY!  Call a company that gets it done right.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review, Judy. I'm happy to hear that you've had a positive experience with Pride Plumbing Heating And Cooling! We are committed to providing the best service possible and it's our goal is to make sure every customer leaves satisfied. If there is anything we can do better in the future please let us know so that we may improve.

review.comment: After a DIY went wrong Pride Plumbing was there to help. I called several places that claimed to have same day/ emergency services that could not come out for a day or two. I called Pride Plumbing and they were able to come within an hour. Quick and responsive and very friendly service from the initial phone call and through the appointment. Mark was efficient and stated clearly what he would be doing. He provided cost of services after he inspected and  before he began. I cannot thank Pride Plumbing enough for saving the day!
review.review_reply:
Thank you Stephanie for taking the time to review your experience with Pride Plumbing. I'm so glad we were able to help!

Mark is a great technician and he always does an excellent job. We're happy that he was able to provide you with such valuable information during scheduled service.

review.comment:
Roger with Pride did a fantastic job repairing our boiler! We were having issues and 2 previous companies spent about 15 minutes looking at the boiler and said the only option was a costly full boiler replacement. I decided to get a third and final quote from a smaller company like Pride just to verify and see if there was a price difference. Roger came out (within a few days of calling, other companies were weeks out) and spent nearly an hour diagnosing the boiler and how it was running. He even called the boiler manufacturer w the serial number to find out when it was made. Turns out the boiler is less than 10 years old! The other companies, without checking, said it was from the 80's, too old to repair and we needed a new one. After finding that out Roger did a full system run down: flush, new inlet valve and ordered a new aquastat which was the main problem. He was able to fit it into the very small space where the other companies said they couldn't. Not only did he make sure everything was functioning properly, but he came out the next day (at no extra charge)  because he was thinking the previous night he could actually make the system run better by adjusting the aquastat to a different mode. That is above and beyond in my book. I will definitely be calling Roger with Pride next time we have a plumbing issue.

He saved us upwards of $9,000.

Thank you!
review.review_reply:
Hi Luke, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. I'm so glad that Roger was able to diagnose and fix your boiler!

I will pass this feedback along to Roger as well as our team here. We are always looking for ways to improve our service and serve customers better, so please don't hesitate to reach out if there is anything we can do in the future or if you have any other questions or concerns about Pride Plumbing Heating & Cooling.

review.comment:
We had them come out to do an estimate for our sewer line. Roger, our technician, was very honest, informative/knowledgeable and was great to work with.
However, through the visit we realized we might need different services/reevaluate what we need done (so no fault of their own). While we didn’t end up using their services beyond this, I would highly recommend them to others in the area.
review.review_reply:
Thank you for your kind words, Lilly. We're glad to hear that Roger was able to help you in the process of understanding what might be needed for your home.

We do our best to provide honest and transparent estimates so customers can make informed decisions about their plumbing needs. I'm sorry we weren't able to take on this job but if there's anything else we can do, please don't hesitate to reach out!

review.comment: The guys were prompt, friendly, efficient and found the problem immediately. When I called for an appointment, they were very responsive. I was given price/product advice and options before any work was started.
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pride Plumbing Heating and Cooling, This is everything we are looking for in a review, customer service first and foremost!

review.comment:
I had used Pride in the past so I used them recently to replace two shut off valves that were under a sink. I had cleared out from under the sink and both shut offs were pretty easy to get to.
I was taken back by the $300 they said it would cost to replace them, and that I was getting a deal because they normally charge $225 to replace one shut off.
The only reason I agreed was that the contractor that was replacing the bathroom counter was coming out the next day, and if I delayed having the shut offs replaced it would be almost two months before the contractor could get back out there. It took them about 30 minutes to replace both shut offs, excluding the time it took for them to go to the hardware store for the shut off valves.
The more I think about it, the more frustrated I am with myself for not just delaying the whole project, buying the tools and parts, and doing it myself.
I gave three stars because the work was done correctly.
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pride Plumbing PHC, We appreciate your business and understand your frustration. If you decide to give us another chance we will take 15 % off next visit.

review.comment: Steven was very knowledgeable , prompt, professional, will definitely use again in the future
review.review_reply: Thank you for choosing Pride Plumbing Heating and Cooling, We appreciate your business!
Thank you, we appreciate your business!

review.comment: Pride was recommended to me by another HVAC company who didn’t have availability in their schedule to send someone out same day. After speaking with Dana about my water heater issues—the pilot light wouldn’t stay lit—the Pride technicians were at my door within an hour. Luke and David were prompt, courteous, and clearly knowledgeable about their trade. The parts needed to repair my water heater weren’t available in town (13 yr old Richmond gas water heater), so I was quoted on a replacement. The installation was quick and the cleanup immaculate. 5 hours after my first contact with Pride I had a new water heater.
